validators¶

Validator behaviours subclass beaconrunner.validatorlib.BRValidator and use attributes exposed in self.data (of type beaconrunner.validatorlib.ValidatorData) to make decisions. Subclasses of BRValidator must define at least two methods:

  • attest(self, known_items) -> Optional[Attestation]

  • propose(self, known_items) -> Optional[Attestation]

class beaconrunner.validators.ASAPValidator(state: beaconrunner.specs.BeaconState, validator_index: beaconrunner.specs.ValidatorIndex)[source]¶

Validator behaviour attesting and proposing honestly, following the honest validator specs.

attest(known_items) → Optional[beaconrunner.specs.Attestation][source]¶

Returns an honest Attestation as soon as at least four seconds (SECONDS_PER_SLOT / 3) have elapsed into the slot where the validator is supposed to attest. Checks whether an attestation was produced for the same slot to avoid slashing.

Parameters

  • self (ASAPValidator) – Validator

  • known_items (Dict) – Known blocks and attestations received over-the-wire (but perhaps not included yet in validator.store)

Returns

Either None if the validator decides not to attest, otherwise an honest Attestation

Return type

Optional[Attestation]

propose(known_items) → Optional[beaconrunner.specs.SignedBeaconBlock][source]¶

Returns an honest SignedBeaconBlock as soon as the slot where the validator is supposed to propose starts. Checks whether a block was proposed for the same slot to avoid slashing.

Parameters

  • self (ASAPValidator) – Validator

  • known_items (Dict) – Known blocks and attestations received over-the-wire (but perhaps not included yet in validator.store)

Returns

Either None if the validator decides not to propose, otherwise a SignedBeaconBlock containing attestations

Return type

Optional[SignedBeaconBlock]

class beaconrunner.validators.PrudentValidator(state: beaconrunner.specs.BeaconState, validator_index: beaconrunner.specs.ValidatorIndex)[source]¶
attest(known_items) → Optional[beaconrunner.specs.Attestation][source]¶

Returns an honest Attestation as soon as at least four seconds (SECONDS_PER_SLOT / 3) have elapsed into the slot where the validator is supposed to attest and a block was received for the slot or at least 8 seconds (2 * SECONDS_PER_SLOT / 3) have elapsed. Checks whether an attestation was produced for the same slot to avoid slashing.

Parameters

  • self (PrudentValidator) – Validator

  • known_items (Dict) – Known blocks and attestations received over-the-wire (but perhaps not included yet in validator.store)

Returns

Either None if the validator decides not to attest, otherwise an honest Attestation

Return type

Optional[Attestation]

propose(known_items) → Optional[beaconrunner.specs.SignedBeaconBlock][source]¶

Returns an honest SignedBeaconBlock as soon as the slot where the validator is supposed to propose starts. Checks whether a block was proposed for the same slot to avoid slashing.

Parameters

  • self (PrudentValidator) – Validator

  • known_items (Dict) – Known blocks and attestations received over-the-wire (but perhaps not included yet in validator.store)

Returns

Either None if the validator decides not to propose, otherwise a SignedBeaconBlock containing attestations

Return type

Optional[SignedBeaconBlock]
